channel.title: 2 things to fix. please help
channel.description:
1.[b]Pick up glitch-[/b] To pick up an item you need to be right on top of that item. if your not you must click it then click it again once you are on top of it.
2.[b]Making an npc attack back-[/b] When i am the only one online npcs attack back. when there is 2+ players online npcs stop attacking back. The only npc that attacks back all the time is jad & kq
Any sort of help would be nice =)
sorce:allstar scape v2

item.title: 2 things to fix. please help
item.dc:creator: @issac issac
item.description:
@issac wrote:

1.Pick up glitch- To pick up an item you need to be right on top of that item. if your not you must click it then click it again once you are on top of it.

2.Making an npc attack back- When i am the only one online npcs attack back. when there is 2+ players online npcs stop attacking back. The only npc that attacks back all the time is jad & kq

Any sort of help would be nice =)

sorce:allstar scape v2
